articles.content: However, SBI's total deposits were about 18.5 times higher at Rs 45,67,927 crore, as compared to Rs 2,45,734 crore of BoM in absolute terms.

articles.title: ONGC, IOC, Other Oil PSUs To Invest Rs 1.2 Lakh Crore In FY25 - NDTV Profit
articles.description: The investment proposed in 2024-25 is 5% higher than Rs 1.12 lakh crore spent in the previous fiscal.
